name: Sugar Skull Wool Messenger Bag with adjustable strap
description:
This handmade messenger bag is completely fun and cool with it's sugar skull wool exterior. I used a high quality genuine Pendleton ® Wool jacquard blanket weight fabric in a bold bright sugar skull design. The skulls are in bright colors of blue, green, yellow, orange, pink and purple. This is just the greatest and coolest fabric. The big panels of the body of the bag are of this sugar skull wool. The side pieces and strap are made from solid black wool also made by Pendleton ® Wool. It closes with a front flap secure with velcro. 
To give this bag some body and structure I used foam interlining. It reinforced stitching in key areas. It is lightly padded.
I have fully lined it with black koan cotton that has been fully interlined with interfacing. Inside you will find a set of slip style pockets perfect for a couple pens and a couple small items. there is also a zippered pocket inside. This pocket has been fully lined with a fun hot pink and black zebra print. 

Exterior measurements of bag body about 17 inches wide by 11 inches tall by 2 inches deep. 
Adjustable strap measures about 1 1/2" wide and can adjust from 29 to 52 inches long with a drop of 11 to 24 inches to the top of the bag. I can comfortably wear this cross body style. 

Care: Dry Clean only

International buyers are responsible for any and all duties, taxes, VAT and fees that they may be assess by their country, custom office or postal systems.

name: Book Style Basic Kindle Cover in Olive Green and Gray Plaid Wool
description:
This handmade book style cover will fit the basic Kindle. That would be the current (4th and 5th generation) basic kindle with the 5 way controller. The exterior of this cover is a genuine Pendleton ® wool fabric. It's a simple plaid in colors or olive green, gray and even a bit of dark red. This cover is fully lined with a soft gray kona cotton.

Fits:
Kindle 4 and Kindle 5

Features:
casual book style
soft structure
4 corner triangles to securely hold the ereader
Slip style pockets opposite the ereader for any little extras
velcro tab closure

Care: dry clean only

This is a soft style cover. It is interlined with interfacing and low loft batting. It is NOT a standing cover.

name: Olive Green and Gray Plaid Wool Handbag
description:
This simple and casual handbag is a great everyday type bag. It's not too big and not to small. I used a great eco-wise Pendleton ® wool fabric. It is a olive green and gray plaid with some darker gray and red toned stripes. It is fully lined with a sold grey kona cotton.

Features:
casual day time style 
Snap tab closure at the top of the bag
small slip style interior pocket
soft structure 

Measurements
Bag body 8" wide, 7" tall, and 3" deep.
The handles are integrated in the design and make the total height of the bag about 14"; there is a 7" drop to the top of the bag. 

Exterior - Genuine Pendleton ® Wool
Lining - 100% cotton
Interlined with interfacing and fusible fleece
Handles have a ultra suede detail (ultra suede is a polyester product and is vegan. It contains not actual leather)

Care: dry clean only.

name: 8.9 Inch Kindle Fire HD Cover I am Ninja
description:
This casual book style cover will fit the Kindle Fire HD with the larger 8.9" display. The exterior fabric is a cotton print of red and black dressed ninjas on a bright blue background. This cover is fully lined with black kona cotton. This is not a standing type of cover. 

Fits:
Kindle Fire HD 8.9 inch display

Features:
soft flexible structure 
casual book style
velcro tab closure
slip pockets inside opposite the tablet
4 corner triangles to secure hold the kindle

Fabrics
Exterior and lining 100% cotton
Interlined with interfacing and low loft batting

Care: hand wash cool, line dry iron as needed.

name: Soft Book Style Ninja iPad 2, iPad 3, or iPad 4 Cover
description:
This soft book style cover will fit the 2nd, 3rd and 4th generation full size iPads. It is not a standing cover but rather a casual book style case. The exterior fabric is a cotton print called I am Ninja. It features red and black dressed ninjas on a bright blue background. Fully lined with black kona cotton

Features:
casual book style
soft structure with an interlining of interfacing a low loft quilt batting
4 corner triangles to hold the iPad
slip pockets on the opposite interior side as device
velcro tab closure

Fits: iPad 2, iPad 3, iPad 4 (retina display)

Care: hand wash cool, line dry, iron as needed with iron set to cotton.

name: I am Ninja Padded Kindle Case or Tech Pouch
description:
This case will fit the 4th and 5th generation Kindle ereader. That's the one with the 5 buttons. The exterior fabric is this great, fun ninja cotton print in colors of red, black and bright blue. Fully lined with black kona cotton. It is interlined with a foam interlining for the padding. It closes secure with a flap secured by velcro.
You could also use this to store small cords.
Exterior measurement is about 7 1/2" by 5 1/2"

Care: hand wash cool, line dry.

name: Book Style Kindle Cover I Am Ninja
description:
This handmade soft book style cover will fit the basic Kindle ereader (see models below) and the Kobo Touch. The exterior fabric is a Ninja print in red, black and bright blue. It is fully lined with black kona cotton. The ereader is held securely by 4 corner triangles and on the opposite side is a set of slip style pockets for any small extras you may wish to carry with you. It is interlined with interfacing a low loft quilt batting. This gives is soft structure but it is not a standing type of case. It closes like a book and is secured with a velcro tab.

Fits: 
Kindle: 4th or 5th generation (non-touch, non-keyboard, basic kindle)
Kobo Touch eReader

Exterior and lining 100% cotton
Interlined with interfacing and batting

Care: hand wash cool, line dry iron and needed

name: I Am Ninja 13 inch Macbook Sleeve Style Bag
description:
Do you like the sleekness of a sleeve but need the usability of a bag? Well, if so then this 13 inch laptop bag might just be for you. 

This handmade padded bag was made using a fabric called "I am Ninja". It features Ninjas on a bright blue background. On the back of the bag you will find a single slip style pocket placed between the straps for the handle. The bag is fully lined with black kona cotton. NO interior pockets. 

To give the bag some light padding I have interlined if with a sew in type foam product. It has a front flap secured with velcro. The front handle go up and over the flap. 

This bag fits my 13" macbook pro with some wiggle room. Who wants to fight to get their laptop out of the bag at their local coffee shop?
Don't have a laptop? No fear, you can use this bag for books, notepads, files, and your ipad/tablet device. Think a fun version of a briefcase without being a briefcase. 

Exterior measurement about 14" by 10". Due to the foam interlining the inside measurements are smaller. It should easily fit most laptops that are roughly 13 inches by 9 inch by 1 inch. 

The straps are 1 inch wide. The drop to the top of the bag is about 7" make these good for holding in your hands or elbow. Might be a bit snug for over the shoulder. 

Care: hand wash cool, may be spun out in washing machine, line dry, iron as needed with an iron set to cotton. Take care not to iron the velcro as it will melt.

name: Douglas Tartan Wool Messenger Bag, Black and Grey Plaid
description:
Black and Grey of the Douglas Tartan is a classic and timeless color combination. This handmade messenger bag was made using a high quality wool that is a genuine Pendleton ® Woolen Mills fabric. The exterior is all this wonderful tartan. There is a slip style pocket on the back of the bag. I stitched it down the center so you end up with two smaller pockets instead of one really wide one. There is a fully adjustable cross body strap and the bag is kept close with a velcro closure under the flap. 
It is fully lined with a grey, black and bright yellow cotton print. Inside is another small slip style pocket and a zippered pocket.
This bag is fully interlined with interfacing and a sew in foam product so it's a very lightly padded. 
Makes a great laptop bag, book bag, and more. It's unisex exterior makes it good for a man or woman. 

Bag measures 16 1/2" by 12" by 2" (41.91cm by 30.48cm by 5.08cm)
Those are the exterior measurements 

Strap is 1 1/2" (1.27 cm) wide by 31" - 53" (78.74cm - 134.62cm) long with a drop about 11" - 24" (27.94cm - 60.96cm) to the top of the bag. Plenty of length to wear is cross body. I used nickle plated metal hardware. 

Care: Dry Clean Only.

name: Gothic Nevermore Cover for Kindle Fire HD 8.9 inch display
description:
This book style cover fits the Kindle Fire HD with the 8.9" display. The exterior fabric is a great creepy gothic collage style design called nevermore. It pays some homage to Edgar Allan Poe. There are bats, spiders, skulls, ravens and frogs in this design. Lined with a white print from the same fabric line featuring handwriting, writing instruments, and more ravens.
It features 4 corner triangles for holding the Kindle Fire, a set of slip style pockets on the opposite side, and a fabric and velcro tab closure

Fits: Kindle Fire HD - 8.9" display measures 9.4" x 6.4" x 0.35" (240 mm x 164 mm x 8.8 mm)

To give this cover some structure and a slightly padded appearance I have interlined it with interfacing and batting.

Care: hand wash cool, line dry, may be ironed as needed

name: Nevermore Gothic Cover for iPad 2, 3 or 4, book style
description:
This handmade book style cover will fit the 2nd, 3rd and 4th generation full sized iPad. The exterior fabric is called Nevermore. The collage style print pays homage to Edgar Allan Poe and general gothic creepiness. The print is in colors of black, browns, and golden tones. There are owls, skulls, bugs, skeleton hands, leaves and potions on bottles. Lined with a white background print of hand writing and ravens in cages.

Features:
casual book style
soft cover, interlined with interfacing a low loft quilt batting
4 corner triangles to hold the iPad
slip pockets on opposite interior side
velcro tab for closure
cotton fabrics for easy care 

Fits:
iPad 2
iPad 3
iPad 4 (retina display iPad)

Care: hand wash cool, line dry, iron as needed

name: Nevermore Gothic Padded Pencil or Tech Case
description:
This handmade case is perfect for pencils or small tech items, cords and so on. The exterior fabric is a cotton print called Nevermore. It's a gothic collage style design in colors of black, brown, and golden tones with words like spells and things like frogs. It is fully lined with a white cotton print of handing writing and a raven. This case in interlined with a foam interlining so it has padding. It has a zipper closure at the top.
Exterior measurement is about 9 inches by 3 1/2 inches. due to the padding the interior is a bit smaller.

name: 13 inch Padded Laptop, Macbook Pro Sleeve Style Case, Modern Tree
description:
This simple laptop sleeve fits my 13 inch MacBook Pro nicely with a bit of space so you wont feel like you are fighting to get the laptop out. The exterior fabric is a wonderful home decor weight cotton print of modern tree branches and flowers in colors of dark grey, white, black, brown, mustard and a bit of orange. Lined with black kona cotton and interlined with foam for padding. Closes with a flap secured with velcro. 
This sleeve measures about 14 1/4 inches by 11 inches on the exterior. It should comfortably fit a laptop about 13 inches by 9 inches by 1 inch thick.
 
Care: hand wash cool, line dry, iron as needed

Macbook not included.

name: Modern Tree Print Messenger Bag, Cotton Canvas Laptop Bag
description:
This handmade messenger style bag. It has a foam interlining to provide some cushioning and padding. The exterior fabric is a durable cotton home decorator weight material with a modern tree and floral like print. It's very modern with colors of dark gray, white, black, brown and hints of bold orange. I have fully lined this bag with black kona cotton. It has an interior slip style pocket with room for a couple of pens, and a few small items. The bag has a flap secured with velcro.
Bag measures about 15 inches wide, 11 inches tall and 2 inches deep. Measurements taken on exterior.
It has an adjustable strap with metal slides that measures about 1 1/2" wide and adjusts from 27 inches to 50 inches long with a drop of 10 inches to 22 inches to the top of the bag. Plenty of length to wear this bag cross body style. 

Care: hand wash cool, line dry, may to ironed with an iron set to cotton

name: Leather Accented Plaid Wool Shoulder Bag Purse
description:
This handmade shoulder bag style purse features chocolate brown leather in key areas as an accent to the luxurious olive green, brown and blue plaid wool. The front features a smooth center panel and pleated side pieces. The back of this bag is smooth. This bag has a front closing flap secured with a magnetic snap. It is fully lined with a brown mod floral print and inside you will find a zippered pocket. It is fully interlined with fusible fleece. This bag is softly structured and it will be soft and floppy. 

Purse measures 14" wide by 3" deep at the base and 10" wide and 1" deep at the top. It is about 11" tall. The strap is about 1" wide and 29" long with a drop of about 14" to the top of the bag.

Care: professional clean only


Exterior is made from genuine cowhide leather, genuine Pendleton® wool fabric.
Lined with 100% cotton fabric.
Interlined with fusible fleece and interfacing.

name: Nevermore, Gothic Kindle 4, Kindle 5, or Kobo Touch Cover
description:
This handmade book style cover will fit the 4th and 5th generation Kindle. That's the one with the 5 way controller porbably what most would consider the basic Kindle ereader. This cover will also fit the Kobo Touch ereader. The exterior fabric is this great gothic like cotton print that pays a bit of homage to Edgar Allan Poe. The fabric is called nevermore and this cover features images like a bat, skulls, words like potions and just general victorian creepiness. It is on colors of black, gold and white. Lined with a white background print of writing and imagery relating to writing and ravens.

Features:
soft flexible structure
casual book style
4 corner triangle to hold the ereader
slip pockets on opposite interior side for any extras
velcro tab closure

fits:
kindle 4 and 5
kobo touch

care: hand wash cool and line dry, may be ironed with an iron set to cotton. 

Enjoy reading the works of Poe on your kindle while it is in this cover. The Tell-Tale Heart is one of my favorites.

name: Lavender and White Zebra Print Cover for Kindle Fire
description:
This soft cover, book style cover fits the standard Kindle Fire. The exterior fabric is a lavender and white zebra print cotton. Lined with solid white kona cotton. It features 4 corner triangles for holding the Kindle Fire, a set of slip style pockets on the opposite side, and a fabric and velcro tab closure

To give this cover some structure and a slightly padded appearance I have interlined it with interfacing and batting.

Care: hand wash cool, line dry, may be ironed as needed

This cover will not fit the Kindle Fire HD. I do have it available for both HD models so please check out that section of my shop.

name: Nook HD Cover in Lavender and White Zebra Print
description:
This cover is available for the Nook HD and the Nook HD Plus. Please make sure to order the correct size.
The exterior fabric for this handmade book style case is a lavender and white zebra print. It is fully lined with a white Kona cotton. 

Fits:
Nook HD: Height: 7.65" (194.4 mm), Width: 5.00" (127.1 mm), Depth: 0.43" (11.0 mm)

Nook HD+ (Plus): Height: 9.46" (240.3 mm), Width: 6.41" (162.8 mm), Depth: 0.45" (11.4 mm)

Features:
casual book style
4 corner triangles to hold the device securely
slip pockets on the opposite interior side of device for any extras
fabric and velcro tab closure

I use interfacing and a single layer low loft batting to give my covers the soft structure.
Care: hand wash cool, line dry, may be ironed as needed

name: Lavender and White Zebra Print Kindle Fire HD Cover
description:
I have covers made and ready to ship for both Kindle Fire HD models. Please make sure to order the correct one and I only have one for each size so don't miss out.
The exterior fabric for this handmade book style cover is a lavender and white zebra print. I have fully lined it with white kona cotton.

It features 4 corner triangles for holding the Kindle Fire, a set of slip style pockets on the opposite side, and a fabric and velcro tab closure

Fits: 
Kindle Fire HD - 7" display, 7.6" x 5.4" x 0.4" (193 mm x 137 mm x 10.3 mm)

Kindle Fire HD - 8.9" display measures 9.4" x 6.4" x 0.35" (240 mm x 164 mm x 8.8 mm)


To give this cover some structure and a slightly padded appearance I have interlined it with interfacing and batting.

Care: hand wash cool, line dry, may be ironed as needed

name: Teal and White Yukata Floral iPad Mini Cover
description:
This book style cover will fit the iPad Mini. It is one of a kind or at least one of a kind for me as I only had enough fabric to make the one cover. The exterior fabric is 100% cotton, Hand Dyed, Yukata fabric from Japan. Normally used to make summer weight Kimonos I used this piece to make this simple case for the iPad mini. It's in a floral like design of teal, white, grey and pink. Fully lined with white Kona cotton.

Features: 
casual book style
soft and flexible structure
4 corner pieces to hold the iPad
2 slip pockets on opposite side as tablet for any small extras
velcro and fabric tab closure

Fits: iPad mini

Care: Hand wash cool, line dry, may be ironed with an iron set to cotton

Interlined with interfacing and low loft quilt batting to provide the structure without adding bulk.

name: Black Watch Tartan 13 inch Macbook Pro Sleeve, Laptop Case
description:
This laptop sleeve will fit the 13 inch macbook pro as well as other similarly sized laptops. The exterior fabric is 100% wool in the Black Watch tartan. It's a dark plaid with low contrast colors of navy blue, black and dark green. Lined with black kona cotton. Interlined with a foam which creates the structure and adds light padding to the sleeve. It closes at the top with a flap secured by two snaps.
I like some ease on laptop sleeves nothing worse than getting into a fight with your laptop sleeve in the middle of a coffee shop because it's too snug. This sleeve measures about 14 1/4 inches by 11 inches on the exterior. It should comfortably fit a laptop about 13 inches by 9 inches by 1 inch thick. The 13" Macbook Pro will fit in here nicely with some ease as you can see from the images where I have used my macbook. Sorry macbook not included with purchase.

name: 15 inch Laptop Sleeve, Macbook Pro Case, Black Watch Tartan Wool
description:
This laptop sleeve will fit the 15 inch macbook pro as well as other similarly sized laptops. The exterior fabric is a 100% wool in the Black Watch Tartan. Plaid in navy blue, black and dark green. This wool fabric had been treated with a water resistant type coating but I wouldn't considering it water proof. Fully lined with black kona cotton. Interlined with a foam which creates the structure and adds light padding to the sleeve. It closes at the top with a flap secured by two snaps.
I like some ease on laptop sleeves nothing worse than getting into a fight with your laptop sleeve in the middle of a coffee shop because it's too snug. This sleeve measures about 16 inches by 12 1/2 inches on the exterior. It should comfortably fit a laptop about 14 1/2 inches by 10 inches by 1 inch thick. The 15" Macbook Pro will fit in here nicely with some ease.

Dry Clean Only

name: Black Watch Tartan Wool iPad Case, Tech Pouch, Zippered Bag
description:
This padded zippered bag is big enough for an iPad or other similar sized tablet device. Actually it has plenty of wiggle room that an iPad with smart cover might fit in here. You can also use it for carrying around chargers, cords, and any other tech type stuff that always seems to become messy when traveling. The exterior fabric is 100% wool in the Black Watch tartan. It's a plaid design in low contrast colors of navy blue, black and dark green. The wool fabric had been treated on the backside with a water resistance type product. I wouldn't consider it water proof though.
This bag is interlined with foam for padding and fully lined with black kona cotton. Zippered top closure. 

measures on the exterior 12 inch by 9 inch. interior measures are a bit smaller due to the seams. 

care: dry clean only.

name: Black Watch Tartan Pencil Case, Small Tech Pouch
description:
This handmade zippered case can be use for pencils, pens, tech items like charging cords, ipods, iphone and more. It is a padded case that is interlined with foam. The exterior fabric is 100% wool in the Black Watch tartan. It's a low contrast plaid in colors of navy blue, black and dark green. This fabric was actually treated with a water repellent type coating on the back. I wouldn't trust it ti be water proof though. Fully lined with black kona cotton. 
measures about 8 inches by 4 inches on the exterior so the interior is a bit smaller.

name: Brown and Cream Modern Ovals 15 inch Laptop Sleeve, Case
description:
This laptop sleeve will fit the 15 inch macbook pro as well as other similarly sized laptops. The exterior fabric is a sturdy and durable brown and cream modern decorator weight upholstery fabric is an ovals design. Full lined with brown kona cotton. Interlined with a foam which creates the structure and adds light padding to the sleeve. It closes at the top with a flap secured by two snaps. 
I like some ease on laptop sleeves nothing worse than getting into a fight with your laptop sleeve in the middle of a coffee shop because it's too snug. This sleeve measures about 16 inches by 12 inches on the exterior. It should comfortably fit a laptop about 14 1/2 inches by 10 inches by 1 inch thick. The 15" Macbook Pro will fit in here nicely with some ease

name: iPad Case, Tech Gadget Case, Brown Modern Ovals
description:
This zippered padded case is big enough to fit a first generation iPad. Probably big enough to fit one that it in a smart cover. You can also use this case for other tech type items that you may take with you such as charger cords, laptop charger, other brands of ereaders or tablets of similar size. The exterior fabric is a very durable decorator fabric in a modern brown and cream oval design. Fully lined with brown kona cotton. Interlined with foam which provided some light padding and structure. 
Case measures about 12 inches (30.48cm) wide by 9 1/2 inches (24.13cm) tall. The interior measurements are smaller due to the foam interlining.

name: Modern Brown and Cream Ovals Pencil Case, Gadget Case, Clutch
description:
This small zippered bag could use as a pencil case, a case for small gadgets like USB cords or wireless mouse, or even as a small clutch like handbag. The exterior fabric is a very durable, heavy weight decorator fabric in colors of dark chocolate brown and cream. The design is a sleek modern design of ovals. Lined with brown Kona cotton. Interlined with a foam so it is lightly padded and structured. 
Bag exterior measures about 9 inches by 4 1/2 inches (22.86cm by 11.43cm) Interior is a bit smaller due to the foam interlining. It would be safe to assume it's a half to one inch smaller each way on the inside.

name: Nook Simple Touch Cover, Modern FairyTale
description:
This handmade book style cover will fit the Nook Simple Touch including the one with glowlight. The exterior print is a cute castle and tree print that reminds me of a modern twist to the fairytale castles. The fabric is in colors of light blue, pink, green, orange and white. Lined with a pink and white diamond print.

Features:
soft flexible structure
4 corner triangles to securely hold the device
2 sets of slip style pockets for any extras
velcro tab closure

Fits: Nook Simple Touch

Care: hand wash wool, line dry, iron carefully making sure to avoid the velcro tabs.

categories.name: Nook Simple Touch, Nook Glow Covers

name: Ombre Plaid Wool Shoulder Bag purple, dark red, grey
description:
I made this great curvy style shoulder bag out of a beautiful ombre style plaid wool fabric. The fabric is genuine Pendleton® Wool.  It is in colors of grey, purple and burgundy red. I have fully lined this bag with solid grey kona cotton. This bag features a great pleated front pocket and it closes with a front closing flap secured with a magnetic snap. Inside you will find a small slip style pocket and a zippered pocket.
This bag is fully interlined and has fusible fleece. It has a soft structure and may become floppy with usage. 

Bag measures about 17" wide (at widest part), 13" high and 5" deep (at base). 
Single shoulder strap measures about 1 1/4" wide, 27" long, and a drop of about 11 1/2" to the top of the bag.

Care: dry clean only

name: Pomegranate Persian Wall Print Cover for Kindle Fire HD 8.9 inch
description:
This book style cover fits the Kindle Fire HD with the 8.9" display. The exterior fabric is called Persian Wall. This colorway is called Pomegranate. It's a simple repetitive design in colors of dark red, pink, orange, black and gray. Lined with a red cotton print from the same line of fabric. 

It features 4 corner triangles for holding the Kindle Fire, a set of slip style pockets on the opposite side, and a fabric and velcro tab closure

Fits: Kindle Fire HD - 8.9" display measures 9.4" x 6.4" x 0.35" (240 mm x 164 mm x 8.8 mm)

To give this cover some structure and a slightly padded appearance I have interlined it with interfacing and batting.

Care: hand wash cool, line dry, may be ironed as needed

name: Small Zippered Pouch, Pomegranate Persian Wall
description:
This small zippered pouch is great for all sorts of little things like mobile phones, sunglasses, cosmetics, and countless other things. It is padded with a layer of fusible fleece. The exterior fabric is called Persian Wall and the colorway is Pomegranate. It's in colors of dark red, pink, berry pink, orange, black, and charcoal gray. Fully lined with a pomegranate red print. It has a black zipper at the opening. I did french seams so this little pouch should be quite durable. 
Measures about 4 1/2" square

name: CrossBody Hip Bag, Purse, Tablet Bag, Pomegranate Persian Wall
description:
This simple crossbody style bag was made using a bright cotton print call Persian Wall in the colorway Pomegranate. The design is in colors of hot pink, berry pink, pomegranate red, charcoal gray, and black with lines of white. It is fully lined with a pomegranate red print. There is a divided pocket on the back of the exterior perfect for things like a smart phone or things you need to get to easily. Inside there is a small zippered pocket.

Bag (exterior) measures: 9" by 11 1/2'
The adjustable strap measures about 1" wide and can adjust from 27" to 46"  with a drop of 12" to 22" to the top of the bag. Wear it over one shoulder, wear to across your body the choice is yours. 

It is fully interlined with fusible fleece and interfacing. This gives it soft structure and some plight padding. 

Care: hand wash cool, line dry, may be ironed with an iron set to the cotton setting.

name: Front Pocket Cover for Kindle Touch or Paperwhite, Black and White Tattoo
description:
This book style cover will fit the Kindle Touch and the Kindle Paperwhite. This cover features a handy front pocket perfect for taking small extras with you. The fabrics I used were a black and white print called Tattoo and it features scrolls and modern flowers. I also used a grey and white polka dot print. I had to used solid white kona cotton for the lining.

The ereader will be held securely by 4 corner triangle pieces. On the opposite interior side there is a set of slip style pockets. This cover is secured closed with a velcro and fabric tab. 

I interline my covers with interfacing and low loft quilt batting. This provides soft structure while not added a great deal of bulk. 

Care: hand wash cool, line dry, may be ironed with an iron set to the cotton setting. Be careful to avoid the velcro.

Fits:
Kindle Touch
Kindle Paperwhite

name: iPad 2, 3 or 4 Cover Black and White Tattoo Floral Scrolls
description:
This handmade book style cover will fit the 2nd, 3rd and 4th generation full sized iPad. The exterior fabric is called Tattoo and feature scrolls and flowers in a drawing style. The drawings are in shades of black and grey on a stark white background. I lined this cover with a grey and white polka dot print. 
I interline my covers with interfacing a low loft batting for soft structure without adding bulk.

Features:
4 corner triangles to securely hold the iPad
set of slip pockets on the opposite side of the iPad
velcro tab closure

Fits: 
iPad 2
iPad 3
iPad 4


Care: hand wash cool, line dry may be ironed as needed with iron set to cotton. Be careful to avoid the velcro.

name: iPad 1 Cover, Black and White Tattoo Floral Scrolls
description:
This handmade cover will fit the first generation iPad. The exterior of this book style cover is a black, white and grey print of scrolls and modern flowers. The design is actually called Tattoo. I lined this cover with a grey and white polka dot print.

Fits: iPad 1

Features:
casual book style
soft and flexible structure
4 corners to securely hold the tablet
2 slip pockets on the opposite interior side
velcro tab closure.

I interline my covers with interfacing and low loft batting. This adds some soft structure but does not really add bulk. 

Care: hand wash cool, line dry, iron as needed with iron set to cotton be careful to avoid the velcro.

name: Kindle 4, Kindle 5 or Kobo Touch Cover in Red and Black Tartan Wool
description:
This handmade book style cover with fit the 4th and 5th generation Kindle ereaders and the Kobo Touch ereader. The exterior fabric is a fabulous tartan wool in classic red and black. Lined with black kona cotton.

Fits:
Kindle 4 and 5 (non-touch, non-keyboard model, has 5 buttons)
Kobo Touch - one of the corner pieces will cover the power button

Features:
4 corner triangles that securely hold the ereader in place
a set of slip style pockets on the opposite interior side
secured closed with a fabric and velcro tab closure

I interline my covers with interfacing and a low loft batting. This gives the covers soft structure while maintain flexibility. 

Care: dry clean only

name: Nook HD Cover, Cream and Black Plaid Wool
description:
This handmade wool cover will fit the Nook HD. It is a softly structured book style cover. The exterior fabric is a 100% wool in a plaid design in colors of cream and black. Fully lined with black kona cotton. 

Fits:
Nook HD: Height: 7.65" (194.4 mm), Width: 5.00" (127.1 mm), Depth: 0.43" (11.0 mm)

Features:
casual book style
4 corner triangles to hold the device securely
slip pockets on the opposite interior side of device for any extras
fabric and velcro tab closure

I use interfacing and a single layer low loft batting to give my covers the soft structure.
Care:dry clean only

name: Handmade Cotton Wallet, Russian Nesting Doll Fabric
description: This simple cotton print wallet has 3 pockets perfect for money or cards. I like to use mine for those frequent shopper type cards. I used three fabrics all from the same fabric line. The main fabric is a Russian nesting doll print and there are accents of a purple polka dot and an aqua floral. I didn't have quite enough to make the entire wallet from those so I did have to use some solid white kona cotton. It is secured closed with a velcro tab.

name: Russian Nesting Doll print iPad Cover for iPad 2, 3 or 4
description:
This handmade soft, book style cover for the full sized 2nd, 3rd, and 4th generation iPad. It features a great front pocket perfect for a small notebook and a pen or whatever else you might wish to take with you. I used three fabrics all in similar colors. The main fabric features Russian nesting dolls, there is a purple polka dot and a great aqua background floral. 

Features:
front pocket
4 corner triangles that hold the device securely
set of slip style pockets on the opposite interior cover
hidden velcro and fabric tab closure

I interline my covers with interfacing and a single layer of batting. This gives them soft structure but doesn't really add bulkiness.

Devices
iPad 2
iPad 3
iPad 4


Care: hand wash cool, line dry, may be ironed as needed

name: Nook Simple Touch Cover, Russian Nesting Dolls, Front Pocket
description:
This handmade Nook Simple Touch cover features a useful front pocket. In side there is room for the ereader plus additional slip style pockets. The fabrics that I used are a great Russian nesting doll print with accent fabrics in a purple polka dot and an aqua floral that picks up the same colors.

Devices:
Nook Simple Touch
Nook Simple Touch with Glowlight

Features: 
soft flexible structure
casual style
front pocket
2 sets of interior slip style pockets
4 corner triangles to hold the ereader
hidden velcro and fabric tab closure

Interlined with interfacing and a single layer of low loft batting. This adds some soft structure and light protection without adding bulk. 

Care: hand wash cool, line dry, iron as needed with iron set to cotton be careful to avoid the velcro.

name: Red and Black Plaid Wool Purse, Shoulder Bag
description:
This classic red and black plaid wool purse was made using this great fabric from B Blake and Sons. It's a beautiful red and dark charcoal grey or black plaid with fine lines of blue. 100% wool. This shoulder bag features a small front pleated pocket, a smooth back, and a front closing flap secured with a magnetic snap. It is fulled lined with a black, white and red cotton print. Inside there is a small slip style pocket and a zippered pocket. 
It is fully interfaced with an flexible iron on interfacing and a fusible fleece. This gives it some structure but still makes it very flexible and over time it may become floppy. 
Bag measures about 17" wide (at widest part), 13" high and 5" deep (at base). 
Single shoulder strap measures about 1 1/4" wide, 27" long, and a drop of about 11 1/2" to the top of the bag.

Care: dry clean only

name: Kindle Paperwhite, Kindle Touch Cover, Brown Plaid Wool with leather accent
description:
This handmade cover will fit the the Kindle Touch and the Kindle Paperwhite. I made this book style, softcover case out of a brown, red, blue multicolor plaid fabric. the 100% wool exterior is accented with a dark brown leather strap that wraps around the cover and then ties around itself for the closure. This strap is stitched to the cover and is not removable. I have fully lined this cover with a great Moda cotton print of circles that picks up many of the same colors as the exterior plaid.

Features:
book style design
soft flexible structure interlined with interfacing and a single layer of low loft quilt batting
4 corner triangles that hold the device securely
slip style pockets on the opposite interior side
leather strap closure

Care: carefully spot clean as needed. for full cleaning please see a professional cleaner

Fits: kindle touch, kindle paperwhite

It features 4 corner triangles for holding the Kindle Fire, a set of slip style pockets on the opposite side, and a fabric and velcro tab.

To give this cover some structure and a slightly padded appearance I have interlined it with interfacing and batting.

This cover is for the standard Kindle Fire it will NOT fit the Kindle Fire HD.

name: Blue and Black celtic Knot iPad 2 Sleeve original $28
description:
Handmade iPad 2 sleeve using a 100% cotton fabrics. This one was made using a cotton print of blue celtic knots on a black background. I fully lined it with black cotton. It closes with a flap that is secured with a sew on velcro. That closing flap has a soft gentle curve and that same curve is repeated on the back pocket.
To give this cover padding I used a 100% cotton batting. I only used a single layer of a thin batting which will give your iPad some light protection without adding bulk. I, also, reinforce some of the stitching so that you can get plenty of use from the cover.

Care: hand wash cool, line dry, may be ironed as needed.

name: Fortune Cookies iPad 2 Sleeve with back pocket original price $28
description:
I made this iPad 2 sleeve using a 100% cotton fabrics. This one was made using a cotton print of Fortune Cookies. Some of the cookies have little fortunes sticking out; "expect geat things today" and "some create happiness, you create it". I fully lined it with black cotton. It closes with a flap that is secured with a sew on velcro. That closing flap has a soft gentle curve and that same curve is repeated on the back pocket.
To give this cover padding I used a 100% cotton batting. I only used a single layer of a thin batting so it will only provide minimal protection. I, also, reinforce some of the stitching so that you can get plenty of use from the cover.

Care: hand wash cool, line dry, may be ironed as needed.

name: Grey and Olive Green Plaid Wool iPad 2 Sleeve orig price $34
description:
This handmade iPad 2 sleeve was made using a 100% wool fabric. It is the McKellar Tartan or rather what my quick research has lead me to believe is the McKellar Weathered Tartan to be exact. It is in colors of olive green, grey, black and just a small accent of teal blue. I lined it with a 100% cotton solid fabric in a shade of gray. It closes with a flap that is secured with a sew on velcro. That closing flap has a soft gentle curve and that same curve is repeated on the back pocket.
To give this cover some padding I used a 100% cotton batting. I only used a single layer of a thin batting which will give your iPad some light protection without adding bulk. I, also, reinforce some of the stitching so that you can get plenty of use from the cover.

name: Purple Plaid Wool iPad 2 Sleeve original price $34
description:
This 100% wool iPad 2 sleeve was made using a wool plaid fabric in colors of purple, berry pink, lime green, and black. I have fully lined this sleeve with black cotton.
It features a curved detailed back pocket and that same curve was used on the front closing flap which should keep your iPad 2 nice a secure with the velcro closure. 
I have interlined this cleeve style case with a layer of batting for a bit of padding. 

care: dry clean only
